Message:
Laila died at the end of summer.
Dad said it was from old age.

I held her in my arms
until her last breath.

I’ll never forget the feeling of
her body suddenly getting heavy,

and the feeling of something
important slowly leaving it...

The next day, I made a grave
for Laila so that she’d be able
to rest in peace.

I’m sure that was when
I truly became a gravekeeper.
